title: Battered women: violence behind closed doors
creator_contributor_role: J Gary Mitchell Film Company, production company
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Women - Crimes against
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Marriage
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conjugal violence
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Social conditions
description: Examines the problem of wife beating and points out new methods of police intervention in cases of domestic violence. Includes interviews with abusive men and victimised women, encouraging women to speak out and seek protection from violent husbands.
